Package com.intellij.ui

Class HtmlListCellRenderer<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.ListCellRenderer<T>
    Deprecated. 
    the class is no longer used in API; use SimpleColoredRenderer instead

public abstract class HtmlListCellRenderer<T>
extends ListCellRendererWrapper<T>

    • Method Detail

      • customize

        public final void customize(javax.swing.JList list,
                            T value,
                            int index,
                            boolean selected,
                            boolean hasFocus)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: ListCellRendererWrapper
        Implement this method to configure text and icon for given value. Use ListCellRendererWrapper.setIcon(Icon) and ListCellRendererWrapper.setText(String) methods.
        Specified by:
        customize in class ListCellRendererWrapper<T>
        Parameters:
        list - The JList we're painting.
        value - The value returned by list.getModel().getElementAt(index).
        index - The cells index.
        selected - True if the specified cell was selected.
        hasFocus - True if the specified cell has the focus.
